title: Andrew Cuomo Faces Misdemeanor Sex Crime Complaint
sub_head: Complaint alleges Cuomo forcibly touched a former executive assistant
body:
ALBANY, N.Y.—The Albany County Sheriff’s Office filed a criminal complaint against former New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo on Thursday, alleging he forcibly touched a former executive assistant.
Albany County Sheriff Craig Apple said investigators filed the misdemeanor charge in Albany City Court, and a summons was issued to Mr. Cuomo to appear on Nov. 17. A spokesman for the state court system provided the complaint and confirmed a summons was issued.
